title: Who invented butter chicken? Indian judge to rule on Moti Mahal vs Daryaganj dispute over global favourite
description: Two Indian restaurant chains, Moti Mahal and Daryaganj, are locked in a legal battle over the origins of butter chicken, a popular Indian dish. Moti Mahal claims its founder created the curry in the 1930s, while Daryaganj argues that its late family member partnered with Moti Mahal to open the Delhi restaurant in 1947. The lawsuit has gained significant attention in India, with debates on social media and television segments discussing the dish's history. The next hearing is scheduled for May.
